titleStmt.title: The second booke of ayres some, to sing and play to the base-violl alone: others, to be sung to the lute and base violl. VVith new corantoes, pauins, almaines; as also diuers new descants vpon old grounds, set to the lyra-violl.
Ayres, 2nd book
titleStmt.author: Corkine, William, fl. 1610-1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Snodham] for M[atthew] L[ownes] I. B[rowne] and T[homas] S[nodham] Assigned by W. Barley,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publishers' names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
